plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to let you share them with your listings.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for your listings.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The app needs access to your photos to let you share them with your listings.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for your listings.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: The app needs your location to show you nearby products and set your listing location.
